author: chrisr
title: WILD NFT
description: NFTs supporting natural environment are underdeveloped. Huge opportunity exists for NFTs that help protect natural environments & animals.
solution: WILD NFT is a world-class NFT minting/market platform delivering verifiable wellbeing & sustainability for natural environments & animals.
experience: We founded dignifid.org, a nonprofit providing digital ID to support wellbeing for animals & environment. NFT Maker Pro is our tech partner.
